data.title: Caesar and Cleopatra Original 1946 British Half Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1946 British half sheet poster by Rossiter for the film Caesar and Cleopatra directed by Gabriel Pascal with Claude Rains / Vivien Leigh / Stewart Granger / Flora Robson.
